It effectively integrates the biblical definition of ministry while also acknowledging the similarities in values and practices across different faith traditions. The student demonstrates a deep understanding of the importance of ministry in promoting social justice and community ties, aligning well with the concern of understanding the biblical definition of ministry for effective service. Great job!
